title: Is Australia still racist?
body: Don't call me racist media dogs.

replies.body: Silly Question! Which country is not?

racist
noun
1.
a person who believes that a particular race is superior to another.
"I had a fear of being called a racist"

Not many people know the definition of racist, but there is a high chance that Australia doesn't believe that for example - "Caucasians are Superior to people of Hispanic decent"

I believe that the word racist should be changed to something to do with 'culture', being that people dislike muslim cultures for their tendency to mistreat women. Or the Asian culture of eating dog meat.
But I guess if I disagree with those, I'm a racist, and if that is the case I'm proud to be one.

How dare you think to assume the white supremacy race is better, we don't assume, we are!

And on another note, why on earth would anyone think the average Australian is not racist? We are terrible down here, and not just the whites, but there are areas where the Aboriginals are racist, there are blacks in West Melbourne who are racist to the whites, the list goes on, but much better than some parts of the world.

But I do agree with you, once you learn the meaning of racism all of us are racist in some way, can that can be viewed as a good thing in the right context.

To be completely honest, if anyone spent enough time with me, they would figure out that I am very 'politically incorrect'. I've been called a racist by telling some aboriginal jokes and sarcastically pointing out the stereotypes of asians (they really cant detect sarcasm). I'm just a guy who enjoys dark humour (pun intended).
But no, freedom of expression is only free if you're nice.

A lot of us are politically incorrect, but it just needs to be done in the correct setting. You can't go about in a major city yelling obscenities and in this day and age need to be careful about your sarcasm, it can get you into trouble.

The problem is there are 2 types of 'racists', those who do it in good fun and don't actually mean to hurt anyone and those who take it too far purposely trying to hurt others because they think they are better than everyone else.

It's sad, eventually there will be no humour left and we will be like fucking robots.

The thing is, every race and culture is racist inherently. Australia is just very multicultural. From Whites complaining about abos and Asians to Asians complaining about other Asians and Whites and abos and abos not getting jobs, we're all racist, it's just more apparent due to our multicultural nation.

"racist" is a stupid term, we are the **human race**; one race, not many.

Honestly though I wouldn't necessarily call Australia "racist", it's just in our culture to be c*nts.
It's racist unless the person is white
according to certain sources if you are white(*most tumblr users*) you are automatically a racist.... so yes.
Very much so. Australia is very racist
